special_abilities.name: Source.
descriptions: tales from the yawning portal,  page 242

special_abilities.name: Barkskin.
descriptions: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment.
descriptions: Sharwyn has a spell book that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Sharwyn is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): light, prestidigitation, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): light, prestidigitation, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: 1st level (2 slots): color spray, magic missile, shield, sleep.
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (2 slots): color spray, magic missile, shield, sleep.

special_abilities.name: Tree Thrall.
descriptions: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Dagger.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
